name: Akame ga Kill Visual Novel (Fan Made)
name_original: Akame ga Kill Visual Novel (Fan Made)
description:
A fan made self insert visual novel. Far from finished.

This is very low quality I am not a pro dev so please no kill. I legit wrote this draft after a day of using ren'py. There's like only one good sprite.

Has literally no features besides custom names. Might add choices that effect outcomes idk. This includes character deaths or the ability to date.

This follows the plot of Akame ga Kill. I might mix the manga and the anime and write my own stuff up. It's some what cringey. At least for me.

Doing this in my spare time or smth.

The music used claims to be royalty-free. Some tracks are by me however, being an amateur musician.
